title: Yoshiwara, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LLQ; ULQ
description: rear view of attendant leading horse with three passengers down narrow, tree lined path; a few other travelers ahead; wetlands at L and R of path; Mt. Fuji in horizon at L, rendered in brown
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
